subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Hedo Turkoglu shot an off-balance 3-pointer with time running out — when all the host Orlando Magic needed to break a tie against the Kevin Garnett-less Boston Celtics was a 2-pointer.
snippet: Hedo Turkoglu shot an off-balance 3-pointer with time running out — when all the host Orlando Magic needed to break a tie against the Kevin Garnett-less Boston Celtics was a 2-pointer.
